title: Trade In with Evergreen Wireless
description: At Evergreen Wireless, we believe that your mobile device should be more than just a phone. It should be a tool that enhances your life and helps you stay connected with the people and things that matter most. That’s why we offer the latest smartphones and accessories at competitive prices. Shop now and take your mobile experience to the next level.

tradeinForm.leadParagraph1: At Evergreen Wireless, we believe that your mobile device should be more than just a phone. It should be a tool that enhances your life and helps you stay connected with the people and things that matter most. That’s why we offer the latest smartphones and accessories at competitive prices. Shop now and take your mobile experience to the next level. With our Trade-In Program, you can earn up to $800 in credit by trading in your old phone, tablet, or watch. It’s our way of helping you get the device you want – for less.
tradeinForm.leadParagraph2: Ready to upgrade and save? Trade in your device today and make the most of our exclusive offer!

step1.title: Buy or Upgrade
step1.description: When you purchase a new device or upgrade online, you’re eligible to trade in an old device.

step2.title: Send in Your Old Device
step2.description: Simply follow the instructions to ship your old device for free.

step3.title: Get Credit on Your Account
step3.description: Once approved, a credit will be applied directly to your bill – no waiting for checks or extra steps.

step1.title: More Savings
step1.description: Reduce the cost of your new device by trading in old tech.

step2.title: Eco-Friendly
step2.description: Help us reduce e-waste by recycling your old device responsibly.

step3.title: Fast & Easy
step3.description: The whole process is hassle-free and can be completed from the comfort of your home.

step1.title: Back up
step1.description: Back up contacts, emails, photos, and other personal data, as the phone won't be returned after trade-in.

step2.title: Remove memory cards and SIM cards
step2.description: If applicable, remove any memory cards.

step3.title: Charge battery
step3.description: Ensure the battery is charged so that we can evaluate the phone’s trade-in value.

step4.title: Remove all accounts
step4.description: Turn off the 'Find my iPhone' feature, or remove your Google account for Android phones.

step5.title: Disable Mobile Device Management lock
step5.description: For business/corporate phones: identify and disable the Mobile Device Management (MDM) lock on your phone.

step6.title: Perform a factory reset
step6.description: Reset your phone to the original factory settings.

description.step1: The screen is intact, with no major cracks.
description.step2: Buttons, speakers, and ports work perfectly.
description.step3: Battery holds a charge, and the device responds smoothly to input.

description.step2: Non-functional buttons or unresponsive touch screen.
description.step3: Charging issues, poor battery life, or intermittent power problems.
description.step4: Damaged or broken speakers, microphones, or cameras.

description.step1: The device does not power on at all.
description.step2: Severe physical damage, such as bent or broken body.
description.step3: Water damage or other irreparable hardware issues.
description.step4: Missing or damaged essential components like the battery or motherboard.

toProceed: to proceed with the trade-in process.
tradeInQuote: Get a Trade In Quote with Evergreen Wireless
loginMessage: Please log in to proceed with the trade-in process.
loginMessageEnd: to proceed with the trade-in process.
batchUploadDescription: Upload a CSV file to process multiple trade-ins at once.
